mapper.sql: FROM student_status ss LEFT JOIN graduation_info gi ON ss.student_number = gi.student_number LEFT JOIN class_information ci ON ss.class_identifier = ci.class_identifier LEFT JOIN personal_info pi ON ss.id_number = pi.id_number AND ss.grade = pi.grade

choose.when: AND (ss.academic_status = '在籍' OR ss.academic_status = '在籍新生')

sql.if: AND YEAR(gi.graduation_date) = YEAR(#{entity.graduationDate}) AND MONTH(gi.graduation_date) = MONTH(#{entity.graduationDate})

mapper.select:
SELECT ss.*, gi.graduation_date, gi.graduation_photo, ci.class_name, pi.name, pi.gender, pi.birth_date, pi.political_status, pi.ethnicity, pi.phone_number, pi.address, pi.entrance_photo, ci.tuition
WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY ss.grade DESC, ss.college, ss.major_name, ss.level, ci.class_name
